Reviews.Title: is ok, just have a problem
Reviews.Author: patricia
Reviews.Content: tengo un problema con el, cuando me entra una llamada o realizo una llamada, al momento de contestar la pantalla se muere y no me deja colgar la llamada.I have a problem with the phone, when I get a call or make a call, when answering the screen dies and will not let me hang up.
